metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3996 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Unauthorized unmount in util-linux's libmount

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2021-3996` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

bsdextrautils - 2.36.1-8ubuntu2.2
bsdutils - 2.36.1-8ubuntu2.2
eject - 2.36.1-8ubuntu2.2
fdisk - 2.36.1-8ubuntu2.2
libblkid1 - 2.36.1-8ubuntu2.2
libfdisk1 - 2.36.1-8ubuntu2.2
libmount1 - 2.36.1-8ubuntu2.2
libsmartcols1 - 2.36.1-8ubuntu2.2
libuuid1 - 2.36.1-8ubuntu2.2
mount - 2.36.1-8ubuntu2.2
rfkill - 2.36.1-8ubuntu2.2
util-linux - 2.36.1-8ubuntu2.2
util-linux-locales - 2.36.1-8ubuntu2.2
uuid-runtime - 2.36.1-8ubuntu2.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: util-linux package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.36.1-8ubuntu2.2').
